Norm

Class DateTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.naomi.regex.Pattern
      • org.naomi.regex.ConcatenatePattern
        • Norm.DateTime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AlterationListener

    public class DateTime
extends ConcatenatePattern
    Example class that uses Naomi to parse an Email date-time component, as specified by the IETF date-time specification (RFC2822).
